text: I znayte, chto sred' vas - poslannik ot Allakha, I yesli by v delakh mirskikh On chasto sledoval sovetam vashim, Vy b preterpeli mnogo bed. No vdokhnovil na veru vas Allakh, Chto krasotoy svoyeyu ozarila vashe serdtse. On sdelal nenavistnymi dlya vas Neveriye, zlonraviye i nepokorstvo; Vot takovy - idushchiye pryamym putem
